game.name: Cats Organized Neatly
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 이 2D 퍼즐 게임에서는, 그리드에 맞게 당신의 고양이 친구들을 배열해야만 합니다. 캣츠 오거나이즈드 니틀리 (Cats Organized Neatly) 는 80 가지의 다양한 수공예 레벨과 다양한 모양 및 크기의 고양이 무리들이 나옵니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this 2D puzzle game you have the responsibility to arrange your feline friends in a way that fits the grid. Cats Organized Neatly comes with 80 different handcrafted levels and a whole bunch of cats in all shapes and sizes.

reviewHighlights.text: At first, the game is simple and relaxing, but later it becomes so difficult that the head explodes
This game is purr-fect! The cats are super cute, and the puzzles get more challenging as you go, but they’re never frustrating. Just pure cozy fun!
